org.threadly.test.concurrent

Interface TestableExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Executor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestablePriorityScheduler

    public interface TestableExecutor
extends java.util.concurrent.Executor

    An interface for executor which can handle VirtualRunnable's and VirtualCallable's in a testing situation.
